code: @Test public void testMockEndpointWithParameter() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint(uri).expectedBodiesReceived("Hello World").     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Override protected CamelContext createCamelContext() throws Exception {     CamelContext context = super.createCamelContext().     // replace smtp with mock     context.addComponent("smtp", new MockComponent()).     return context. }
@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     from("direct:start").to(uri). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").to(uri).         }     }. }
